file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-16-03-04 - AIR INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIR INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the APU air-inlet cover assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU AIR-INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - RE- APU COWLING 49-16-03-000-801-A MOVAL 145-54858 SERIES FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU AIR-INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - IN- APU COWLING 49-16-03-400-801-A STALLATION 145-54858 SERIES EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-16-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-16-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES 2. APU AIR-INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) Obey these instructions to remove the APU air-inlet assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-16-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A NOTE: • Identify the different sizes of the screws (1). This will make the air-inlet cover assembly installation procedure easier and help you install it correctly. Refer to DET. B of Figure 401. • Do not loose the screws (5) before you remove the cover assembly (2). Loose these screws only if you have to remove the intake duct (3) or inlet silencer (4). Refer to DET. C of Figure 401. (1) Remove the screws (1) that attach the assembly to the APU cowling. (2) Remove the air-inlet cover assembly (2). The intake duct (3), or the inlet silencer (4), is attached to the cover assembly. (3) Make sure that the interface sealant (between the cover assembly and the APU cowling) is not damaged. If necessary, apply sealant again (SRM 51-20-01). (4) To remove the intake duct (3), or inlet silencer (4), from the cover, remove the screws (5). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES APU Air-Inlet Cover Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B APU AIR STARTER/GENERATOR INTAKE AIR INTAKE AIR/OIL COOLER INLET A FUSL HOR. C L 2. AIR INLET 1. SCREW COVER ASSEMBLY (24 PLACES) STARTER/GENERATOR EXHAUST DUCT 1 DET. A C 5. SCREW DET. B 4. AIR INLET SILENCER 3. AIR INTAKE DUCT DET. C 1 VALID FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES 145AMM490300.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-16-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-16-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES 3. APU AIR-INLET COVER ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey these instructions to install the APU air-inlet cover assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AIR-INLET SEAL/AIR-INLET DUCT INTERFACE AMM TASK 49-16-02-200-802-A/600 CLEARANCE/MISALIGNMENT- INSPECTION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) If the intake duct (3), or the inlet silencer (4), was removed from the cover, put it in position and install the screws (5). Refer to DET. C of (Figure 401). (2) NOTE: Make sure that you use the correct size of the screws (1) to install the air-inlet cover assembly. Put the cover assembly (2) in its position, in the APU cowling, and install the screws (1). Refer to DET. B of (Figure 401). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-16-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Do a visual inspection on the air-inlet seal/air-inlet duct interface for clearance ( AMM TASK 49-16-02-200-802-A/600). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker. (2) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker.
